attributes.action: Reform parliament to make manifestos to be adhered to by law.
attributes.additional_details: The proposed reform, with an additional policy of anything outside of a manifesto to be put to public vote, will gain more confidence in parliament by the electorate and prevent abuse of power by prospected campaigners.
attributes.background: There is a resounding lack of confidence in our government from the electorate. This is due to manifestos not being adhered to by politicians and the feeling of electorates being told anything in order for the campaigner to gain power.
